description.value: Action Cost: 1 [Interact] action Range: Touch Effect: Touch a corpse. It is preserved from decay indefinitely and cannot become undead through any means. This is a funerary rite, not necromancy - you are consecrating the body and claiming the soul for Nevil's realm. The corpse is protected until you release it or it is desecrated. Usage: Uses 1 Channel Divinity
